thread.title: Lumina Analytics Promotes Jake Shonkwiler to Fill Vice President of Operations

author: cnbc.com
title: Lumina Analytics Promotes Jake Shonkwiler to Fill Vice President of Operations
text:
TAMPA, Fla., Lumina is proud to announce the promotion of Jake Shonkwiler to Vice President of Operations. Jake will oversee Lumina's rapidly growing team of intelligence analysts. Jake has been with Lumina for two years, most recently as Director of Client Services. Before that, Jake practiced commercial law in Tampa and Miami. "Lumina is changing the world. Leveraging cutting-edge machine intelligence with a bright team of analysts, we are solving some of the world's biggest problems," said Shonkwiler. "It is a distinct privilege to work with this group of people and help lead Lumina forward."
"Jake has driven impressive results across all areas of our operations. From effectively standing up our Corporate Litigation Risk Unit to leading some of our most significant engagements, Jake has played an important role in Lumina's rapid growth over the last year," said Senior Vice President, Kris Smeage. "We look forward to taking on even greater challenges and scaling our team of analysts under Jake's proven leadership."
About Lumina Analytics. Lumina is a Tampa based, risk sensing intelligence firm. The company provides data aggregation and analytics services to corporate and government clients throughout the United States. Its focus is on the aggregation of external, publicly available data for risk sensing intelligence. Lumina uses proprietary machine learning algorithms to address certain risks within healthcare, financial services, defense, corporate and national security. The company was founded by serial entrepreneurs Dr. Morten Middelfart (Lumina's Chief Data Scientist) and Allan Martin (Lumina's CEO).
CONTACT: Candace Cole, Candace.cole@luminaanalytics.com
